attributes.action: STOP FLUORIDATION IN SOUTHAMPTON AND HAMPSHIRE WATER Supply
attributes.additional_details:
Stop water fluoridation in Southampton and Hampshire drinking water

I want the Government to STOP adding fluoride to our drinking water it does not prevent dental decay and it is slowly poisoning us..

http://www.ukcaf.org/how_to_stop_fluoridation.html
http://www.govyou.co.uk/s-o-s-stop-fluoridation/
http://ukagainstfluoride.blogspot.com/
The Guardian Newspaper
http://www.guardian.co.uk/politics/2009/feb/15/flouridation-water-opposition
The DailyMail
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-71246/Is-fluoride-good-us.html
Fluride Action Network

Why we are Opposed to Water Fluoridation
Over 3,000 professionals signing our statement, 10 facts about fluoride, and 50 reasons why FAN stands firm in this issue… here are reasons why fluoridating our water supply doesn't add up!
http://www.fluoridealert.org/opposed-water-fluoridation.aspx

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fluoridation_by_country
